RegistrationÂ¶

Data collection begins with the MaternalConsent. When this model is submitted the mother is allocated a unique subject identifier and a link to the maternal dashboard becomes available. From the maternal dashboard one of two eligibility forms are completed (MaternalEligibilityAnte or MaternalEligibilityPost). The eligibility forms open up access to one of two data collection schedules where the lead model for each scheduled timepoint is the MaternalVisit.

The infants are not allocated identifiers until the Labor and Delivery model is submitted. The number of infant identifiers is based on the reported number of live infants and the number of infants to be registered to the study. See mpepu_infant for more details.
